tool.name: OGS: Vtu2Grid
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'Vtu2Grid'.
tool.command: if [ "$input" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$input.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$input' '${$input.element_identifier}'; fi; Vtu2Grid #if str($cellsize_z).strip() != 'None' and str($cellsize_z).strip() != '': --cellsize-z '$cellsize_z' #end if #if str($cellsize_y).strip() != 'None' and str($cellsize_y).strip() != '': --cellsize-y '$cellsize_y' #end if --cellsize-x '$cellsize_x' --input '$input.element_identifier' --output output_1.vtu

param.name: cellsize_z
param.label: cellsize z
param.help: edge length of cubes in z-direction (depth), (min = 0)

param.name: cellsize_y
param.label: cellsize y
param.help: edge length of cubes in y-direction (latitude), (min = 0)

param.name: cellsize_x
param.label: cellsize x
param.help: edge length of cubes in x-direction (longitude) or all directions, if y and z are not set, (min = 0)

tool.help: This tool runs the **Vtu2Grid** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
